name: Media Count
author: Webbita

sections.description:
Media Count plugin count total number of media library items (such as images, videos, documents and audio files) that have been uploaded in to the media library.

You can see the media count by going to the WordPress dashboard and clicking on the “Media Count” menu item. This will open the media library, which displays all of the media items that have been uploaded to your site.

The media count is displayed all the file format uploaded the list of media items.

We can see any images format, audio, video files total count in media library. Currently there are 28 file types wil be showing the total no.of files count.

Supported File Format

  • JPEG
  • PNG
  • WEBP
  • GIF
  • PSD
  • ICO
  • SVG
  • BMP
  • TIFF
  • DOCX
  • DOC
  • CSV
  • XLS
  • TEXT
  • PDF
  • PPT
  • PPTX
  • ODT
  • ZIP
  • MP4
  • MP3
  • WAV
  • MOV
  • MKV
  • OGG
  • AVI
  • 3GP

You can check the Total Media library file counts and stats inside your Dashboard. Please Install the plugin and check your media library stats.
sections.installation: Please Go to Plugins-> Add new and search Media Count or Download the ZIP file from wordpress.org. And then click install to activate the plugin
sections.faq:
How many types of file format could be count?

There are 28 files format could be count in your media library.

Media count show total no.of size?

Yes, Our plugin show total no.of your media library size.

Media count can display SVG file format ?

Yes, It will count total no.of SVG file in your media library.
sections.changelog:
Media library count
28 images, audio, video format

short_description: Media count plugin display total no of files in your WP Media Library. You can see the table format and it will show the total number of files count
